price: (Allah) azabwira (inkozi z’ibibi) ati “Ese mwamaze imyaka ingahe ku isi?”
arabic: قَٰلَ كَمۡ لَبِثۡتُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ عَدَدَ سِنِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qāla kam labith'tum fī al-arḍi ʿadada sinīna
